to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "ありがとうございます！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "承知です！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "よろしくお願いします！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "石川湧馬"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "09041209240"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "yuma.fuu05@gmail.com"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "yuma.ishikawa@knowledgework.com"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

text=$(pbpaste)
if [[ $text =~ https://knowledgework.atlassian.net/browse/KWS-[0-9]+ ]]; then
  title=$(echo $text | cut -d'/' -f5)
  url="https://knowledgework.atlassian.net/browse/$title"
  text=":jira: [$title]($url)"
elif [[ $text =~ https://github.com/knowledge-work/knowledgework/pull/[0-9]+ ]]; then
  title=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/gh pr view $text --json title --jq .title | cut -d']' -f2)
  url=$text
  text=":github: [$title]($url)"
else
  text="[]($text)"
fi


osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "'"$text"'"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "🙏"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "👍"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "🎉"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "【社内】"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "【個人】"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

rules.description: コロンとセミコロンを入れ替える
left_controlで英数字モードに変更
caps_lockで英数字モードに変更
right_optionで日本語モードに変更
left_control + left_command + g でクリップボードの中を検索
